EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Multi-Site Pivotal Cloud Foundry Reference Architecture
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Multi-Site Pivotal Cloud Foundry Reference Architecture: A Technical Comparison of PCF Foundation Configurations: Active-Active, Active-Passive, and “Stretched” <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/multi-site-pivotal-cloud-foundry-reference-architecture]]> white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-multi-site-pivotal-cloud-foundry-reference-architecture]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
